Sentencas: The operating temperature and voltage are the key parameters affecting the performance of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model

Sentencas: In this article a Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy model is proposed to describe the nonlinear temperature and voltage dynamic properties of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model

Sentencas: During the process of modeling, a Fuzzy Clustering Means (FCM) method is used to determine the nonlinear antecedent parameters, and the linear consequent parameters are identified by a recursive least squares algorithm.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model

Sentencas: The validity and accuracy of modeling are tested by simulations.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model

Sentencas: The simulation results show that it is feasible to establish the dynamic model of SOFC by using the T-S fuzzy identification method.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model
Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model
Dynamic modeling of SOFC based on a T-S fuzzy model
